author: Danielle Wallace
title: California churches sue Newsom over coronavirus stay-at-home order
description: Three southern California churches who want to remain open amid the coronavirus pandemic filed a lawsuit against Gov. Gavin Newsom and other officials on Monday, arguing that stay-at-home orders violate their First Amendment right to freedom of religion and a…
